page.title: 20Staploe, Home-Social Life
page.content: A pleasantly rural place to live with rapid connections via the A1 Motorway and St. Neots station to London. The culture of Cambridge is 20 miles away,where car owners can visit professional theatre, cinema and visual arts. Families draw pleasure from their homes. Gardening for produce and floral beauty is the most popular pastime. Hobbies include woodwork, crochet, dress making, machine embroidery, lacemaking. One lady takes a fleece, combs, spins, dyes, weaves and knits it. Sports are motor bike track racing, horse riding, Cricket club (many cups), near professional darts, clay shooting. Two microlights are flown. The County Chairman of the Farming and Wildlife Advisory Group and his wife originated the "Shakespeare at the George" productions at Huntingdon.
